Accept Alter.Description: This action accepts the Target Object to Company DB. Alters an exiting object in DB. If the object does not exists it results in error. Alias is ALTER TARGET.
Accept Alter.Name: Accept Alter

Accept Create.Description: This action accepts the Target Object to Company Data base. That is it saves the target object to the Database. This creates a new object in the database if it does not exist else results in an error. Alias is CREATE TARGET.
Accept Create.Name: Accept Create

Accept Object.Description: This action accepts the Target Object to Company DB. This automatically handles creation/alteration based on the way object was created using NEW OBJECT. Alias is SAVE TARGET.
Accept Object.Name: Accept Object

Add Sheet.Description: This action adds a sheet in the current workbook which is opened for writing. Sheet will always be inserted at the end.
Add Sheet.Name: Add Sheet

Break.Description: Break action is used terminate the execution of the remaining statements inside the loop and the control is transferred to the statement immediately following the loop.
Break.Name: Break

Close Encrypted Target File.Description: This action is used to close an opened target file as encrypted file.
Close Encrypted Target File.Name: Close Encrypted Target File

Close File.Description: This action is used to close an opened source file.
Close File.Name: Close File

Close Target File.Description: This action is used to close an opened target file.
Close Target File.Name: Close Target File

Continue.Description: This action is used to continue the loop with the next iteration after skipping the subsequent statements after that.
Continue.Name: Continue

Decrement.Description: This Action is used to decrement the value of a Variable by the specified Number. If the decrement number is not specified then by default the value is decremented by 1.
Decrement.Name: Decrement

Display Msg.Description: This action is used to display a message box to user in Async mode. It doesnt Wait for an Input from user.
Display Msg.Name: Display Msg

Else.Description: All the subsequent statements after the ELSE action are executed if the condition specified within IF Action is FALSE.
Else.Name: Else

End Block.Description: This action is used to close the block of statements initiated using the START BLOCK, the Object context is restored back to the original state.
End Block.Name: End Block

End For.Description: This action is used to end the FOR loop.
End For.Name: End For

End If.Description: This action is used to close the block of statements specified within the IF statement.
End If.Name: End If

End Msg.Description: Thiwsaction is used to end a prevoiusly Displayed Message.
End Msg.Name: End Msg

End Progress.Description: When a task is completed, Progress Bar can be stopped by using action END PROGRESS.
End Progress.Name: End Progress

End Sub.Description: This action is used to close the block of statements initiated using the START SUB.
End Sub.Name: End Sub

End Unzip.Description: This action is used to extract the files at the specified target directory.
End Unzip.Name: End Unzip

End Walk.Description: This action is used to end the walk collection loop.
End Walk.Name: End Walk

End While.Description: This action is used to close the body of loop started with While Action.
End While.Name: End While

End XSub.Description: This action is used to close the block of statements initiated using the START XSUB.
End XSub.Name: End XSub

End Zip.Description: This action makes the zip file.
End Zip.Name: End Zip

Extract Path.Description: This action is used to add a path to be included for unzipping.
Extract Path.Name: Extract Path

Finalize ProgressBar.Description: When a task is completed, Progress Bar can be stopped by using action Finalize ProgressBar.
Finalize ProgressBar.Name: Finalize ProgressBar

For Coll.Description: This action is used to walk the collection for a specific value.
For Coll.Name: For Coll

For Each.Description: The FOR EACH action is used to iterate over the values in the list variable. The number of iterations depends on the number items in the list variable.
For Each.Name: For Each

For Range.Description: This action allows the user to loop on range of numbers or date. This loop can be used to repeat a loop for the given range of specified values. The range can either be incremental or decremental.
For Range.Name: For Range

For Token.Description: This action is used to walk a String expression separated by a delimiter character. It is used to loop on a String expression and returns one value at a time. The value is returned in the iterator variable.
For Token.Name: For Token

Format Excel Sheet.Description: This action is used to modify properties of excel sheet. Only the properties supported by the system can be modified.
Format Excel Sheet.Name: Format Excel Sheet

If.Description: This action is used to specify a condition.The subsequent statements within the IF and END IF are executed based on whether the condition evaluates to true or false.
If.Name: If

Increment.Description: This Action is used to increment the value of a Variable by the specified Number. If the increment number is not specified then by default the value is incremented by 1.
Increment.Name: Increment

Initialize ProgressBar.Description: This action initializes progress bar object by executing a ProgressBar definition mentioned in the parameter
Initialize ProgressBar.Name: Initialize ProgressBar

Insert Collection Object.Description: This action inserts the new object of the type specified in the collection and makes it as current target object. This object is inserted into the collection at the end.
Insert Collection Object.Name: Insert Collection Object

Log.Description: During expression evaluation, intermediate values of the expression can be passed to calculator window and a log file 'tdlfunc.log' inside the application directory.
Log.Name: Log

Log Target.Description: This action is used to create the log of object, its method and collection for the target object to the specified file.  It accepts filename as a parameter.
Log Target.Name: Log Target

Message Report.Description: This action allows the developer to display a message Report with a specified string.
Message Report.Name: Message Report

Msg Box.Description: This action is used to display a message box to user.
Msg Box.Name: Msg Box

New Object.Description: Creates a New object from object specification and sets it as target object.
New Object.Name: New Object

Open File.Description: This action is used to open a text/excel file for read/write operations.
Open File.Name: Open File

ProgressBar Set Active Stage.Description: This action is used to set the active stage. This will reset the Total Count.
ProgressBar Set Active Stage.Name: ProgressBar Set Active Stage

ProgressBar Set ItemsDone.Description: This action is used to set the number of steps completed in the task.
ProgressBar Set ItemsDone.Name: ProgressBar Set ItemsDone

ProgressBar Update Activity Name.Description: This action is used to set Activity Name to be displayed in progress bar window.
ProgressBar Update Activity Name.Name: ProgressBar Update Activity Name

ProgressBar Update Context.Description: This action is used to set Context to be displayed in progress bar window.
ProgressBar Update Context.Name: ProgressBar Update Context

ProgressBar Update Process Name.Description: This action is used to set Process Name to be displayed in progress bar window.
ProgressBar Update Process Name.Name: ProgressBar Update Process Name

ProgressBar Update Progress Indication.Description: This action is used to set Progress indication to be displayed in progress bar window.
ProgressBar Update Progress Indication.Name: ProgressBar Update Progress Indication

ProgressBar Update SubContext.Description: This action is used to set Subcontext to be displayed in progress bar window.
ProgressBar Update SubContext.Name: ProgressBar Update SubContext

ProgressBar Update Total Count.Description: This action is used to reset the total number of steps involved in the task. This will reset the Items Done.
ProgressBar Update Total Count.Name: ProgressBar Update Total Count

Query Box.Description: This action is used to Display a confirmation box to user and ask for an yes/no response.
Query Box.Name: Query Box

Query Box Ex.Description: This action is used to Display a extended confirmation box to user.
Query Box Ex.Name: Query Box Ex

Query Report.Description: This action allows displaying a Query Report with the specified string.
Query Report.Name: Query Report

Remove Sheet.Description: This action removes the specified sheet from current workbook.
Remove Sheet.Name: Remove Sheet

Rename Sheet.Description: Renames an existing sheet to the New sheet name specified.
Rename Sheet.Name: Rename Sheet

Reset Value.Description: This action sets the value of the method using the Value Formula. If Value Formula is not specified it sets the existing value to null.
Reset Value.Name: Reset Value

Return.Description: This action is used to return the flow of control to the calling program with or without returning a value.
Return.Name: Return

Seek File.Description: This action is used to seek to the specified position in the target file.
Seek File.Name: Seek File

Seek Source File.Description: This action sets the current file pointer to the position specified.
Seek Source File.Name: Seek Source File

Set Active Sheet.Description: This action is used to change the active sheet during read and write operations.
Set Active Sheet.Name: Set Active Sheet

Set File Log Off.Description: This Action is used in conjunction with SET FILE LOG ON. Logging to the file 'tdlfunc.log' can be stopped by action SET FILE LOG OFF.
Set File Log Off.Name: Set File Log Off

Set File Log On.Description: This action is used to Log the values of an expression to log file 'tdlfunc.log'.
Set File Log On.Name: Set File Log On

Set Log Off.Description: This Action is used in conjunction with SET FILE LOG ON. Logging to the file 'tdlfunc.log' can be stopped by action SET FILE LOG OFF.
Set Log Off.Name: Set Log Off

Set Log On.Description: This action is used to Log the values of an expression to log file 'tdlfunc.log'.
Set Log On.Name: Set Log On

Set Object.Description: This action sets the current object with the object Specification. If no object specification is given the target object will be  set as the current object.
Set Object.Name: Set Object

Set Target.Description: This action sets the target object with the Object Specification. If no object specification is given the current object will be set as the target object.
Set Target.Name: Set Target

Set Value.Description: This action sets value of a method for the target object. The value formula is evaluated with respect to the current object context.
Set Value.Name: Set Value

Show Progress.Description: This Action shows the current status of the task to the user.
Show Progress.Name: Show Progress

Start Batch Post.Description: Starts batch posting. The batch post mode is optimized for posting large amount of data.
Start Batch Post.Name: Start Batch Post

Start Block.Description: This action is used to save the current state and execute some actions within the block and return back to the original state.
Start Block.Name: Start Block

Start Progress.Description: This action setup the Progress Bar by mentioning total number of steps involved in the task. In addition to this, Title, Sub Title and Subject of the Progress Bar also can be given as parameter.
Start Progress.Name: Start Progress

Start Sub.Description: This is used to execute a set of actions as a 'sub' procedure effecting the dependency accumulation and triggering.
Start Sub.Name: Start Sub

Start Unzip.Description: This action is used to set the unzip source file and password.
Start Unzip.Name: Start Unzip

Start XSub.Description: This is used to execute a set of actions as an exclusive 'sub' procedure effecting the dependency accumulation and triggering.
Start XSub.Name: Start XSub

Start Zip.Description: This action is used to initialize the target zip file.
Start Zip.Name: Start Zip

Sub Action.Description: This action is to execute action considering it as a 'sub' procedure and effecting the dependency accumulation and triggering.

Sub Action.Name: Sub Action

Truncate File.Description: This action is used to resets the file content.
Truncate File.Name: Truncate File

Unzip Exclude Path.Description: This action is used to add a path to be excluded from unzipping.
Unzip Exclude Path.Name: Unzip Exclude Path

Walk Collection.Description: The Walk Collection is used to execute a set of statements for each object of the collection.
Walk Collection.Name: Walk Collection

While.Description: This action is used to specify the conditional expression to  execute the body of the loop.
While.Name: While

Write Cell.Description: This action Writes the specified content at the cell address specified by row and column number of the currently active sheet.
Write Cell.Name: Write Cell

Write Cell Ex.Description: This action Writes the specified content at the cell address specified by row and column number of the currently active sheet. Apart from writing the data, it also sets focus to the given Cell
Write Cell Ex.Name: Write Cell Ex

Write Column.Description: This action writes multiple cell values at a specified column in the active sheet. The number of values separated by commas are written starting from the initial row number specified for the column.
Write Column.Name: Write Column

Write File.Description: This action is used to append a file with the text specified and it is always works on the target file context.
Write File.Name: Write File

Write File Line.Description: This action is similar to WRITE FILE but it also places a new line character (New Line/Carriage Return) after the text. All the subsequent writes begin from the next line.This action always works on the target context.
Write File Line.Name: Write File Line

Write Row.Description: This action writes multiple cell values at a specified row in the active sheet. The number of values separated by commas are written starting from the initial column number specified for the row specified.
Write Row.Name: Write Row

XSub Action.Description: This action is to execute action considering it as an exclusive 'sub' procedure and effecting the dependency accumulation and triggering.

Zip Add Path.Description: This action adds a path to be included for zipping.
Zip Add Path.Name: Zip Add Path

Zip Exclude Path.Description: This action adds a path to be excluded from zipping.
Zip Exclude Path.Name: Zip Exclude Path
